GAM – IGMP Standard Configuration
Steps to configure IGMP snooping ( IP Multicast Snooping)
1.Create IGMP Interface VLAN
2.Activate IGMP snooping
3.Activate snooping on IPTV VLAN
4.Setting QoS Parameters
5.Monitor Snooping and Multicast Groups
3

--- Page 4 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Creating VLAN interface
VLAN 4000 IPTVVLAN 53 In-band  ManagementConfiguration→System→IP
No DHCP or static IP required for IPTV VLAN
Default Gateway required for In -band management with static IP address only
4

--- Page 5 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Activating IGMP Snooping
Configuration→IPMC→IGMP Snooping→Basic Configuration
By default, the GAM doesn't snoop, therefore all 
multicast packets will be broadcasted to all ports.it is 
important to uncheck Flooding flag
Enable Snooping
Enable Leave Proxy
5

--- Page 6 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Activating IGMP Snooping Cont.
Specify which ports of the GAM act as router ports. A router port is a 
port that leads towards the Layer 3 multicast device or IGMP querier.
Configuration→IPMC→IGMP Snooping→Basic Configuration
Click on Apply button
6

--- Page 7 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Activating IGMP on IPTV VLAN
Enable Snooping on IPTV VLAN only
Set Priority 5 to IPTV VLAN
Configuration→IPMC→IGMP Snooping→VLAN Configuration
The GAM should not be the querier (this option 
shall be disabled) . Most of the time the querier is 
at the video source side
Click on Apply button
7

--- Page 8 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Settings QoS Parameters
8Configuration→QoS→QoS Control List
Click here to set a new QoSControl Entry.


--- Page 9 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Settings QoS Parameters Cont.
9Configuration→QoS→QoS Control List
Uncheck MGMT  Port
Set VID option to Specific  and type the IPTV VLAN ID on Value field
Set CoS to 2
Set PCP to 5
Set DEI to 0
Click on Apply button

--- Page 10 ---
© Positron Access Solutions – 2025
GAM – IGMP – Monitoring Snooping and Multicast Groups
10
The GAM must detect an active querier, if not, the video will disconnect after ~2mins.Monitor→IPMC→IGMP Snooping→Status
Monitor→IPMC→IGMP Snooping→Group Information
